Convert incident object to dataframe

Source: R/conversion.R
as.data.frame.incidence_df.Rd

Convert incident object to dataframe

Usage

# S3 method for incidence_df
as.data.frame(x, ...)

Arguments

x

An incidence() object.

...

Not used.

Examples

dat <- data.frame(dates = Sys.Date() + 1:100,
                  names = rep(c("Jo", "John"), 5))

dat <- incidence(dat, date_index = dates, groups = names)
as.data.frame(dat)
#>     date_index names count
#> 1   2022-11-24    Jo     1
#> 2   2022-11-25  John     1
